channel.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
channel.description:
Hey guys! I've ported one of my Skins I made earlier. [b]Download:[/b] [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?5813w1tkq56in29']https://www.mediafire.com/?5813w1tkq56in29[/url]
Results: [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img208/4255/bmc1a0a0014.jpg[/img] [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img41/131/bmc1a0a0011.jpg[/img] [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img802/8953/bmc1a0a0012.jpg[/img]
It has all required animations for BlackMesa. To play coop follow these instructions.
Edit your launch options and add these commands: sv_lan 0 maxplayers 4 sv_cheats 1 sv_region 255 mp_flashlight 1 deathmatch 1
Open your firewall and open the console: Ip "address" without "

item.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
xalener:

Something like Gears 3’s horde mode with tower defense elements and fort building would be great with HL’s weapon set and gameplay. Placing turrets is already intuitive and a pretty big part of the game. Imagine a mode built on that.

just sayin’

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/21287700/sotf.rar

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
item.dc:creator: Gregorovich
item.description:
What I’d like to see is a kind of survival co-op game. Players are placed in a DM-like arena and must fend of waves of enemies corresponding to that area (eg. fighting waves of zombies, houndeyes etc. in an office-complex-style map, or human and alien grunts in a surface-tension-style map). I dunno, I just love survival games and always wanted to see a HL-style survival game.

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I’d rather have a separate coop campaign with 100% original maps and BM assets than forcing BM to be a coop environment. Something like No More Room in Hell/ Killing floor’s linear arenas wrapped together with a really loose narrative.

Maybe it could even have a handfull of playable semi fleshed out characters i.e. l4d.

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
item.dc:creator: Dert
item.description:
I Hope One day this game will finally have normal Coop, i waited this mod for a while only for this feature… Because Sven Coop really is just stupid shitty multiplayer with bots where everything respawn and dead means nothing because balance is so awful that u need to 2-3 times a level, also i think changing monsters parameters was idiotic decision, this is not stupid meat game! That mod takes really nothing about athmosphere. Also we completed with my bro Half-Life Decay Coop and Blue Shift Coop which were quality mods (And Opposing Force Coop had only problem with respawn and map-change).

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Coop Model
item.dc:creator: kirby
item.description:
Hey guys!
I’ve ported one of my Skins I made earlier.
Download: https://www.mediafire.com/?5813w1tkq56in29

Results:


It has all required animations for BlackMesa.
To play coop follow these instructions.

Edit your launch options and add these commands:
sv_lan 0
maxplayers 4
sv_cheats 1
sv_region 255
mp_flashlight 1
deathmatch 1

Open your firewall and open the console:
Ip “address” without "
